name: Encaged (ToxicCatz, Prox)
description:
A submission for the bullet hell jam 2022.

WASD/Arrow Keys
MovementZ or J
ShootC or L
Activate Portal
X or K
Enable Focus Mode

Dodge the bullets to make the cage grow, shoot the boss to prevent it from shrinking!

If you dodge enough bullets you will also regain health!

Programming and art was by ToxicCatz (https://toxiccatz.itch.io/)

Music by Prox (https://prox276.itch.io/)
SFXs are from freesound.org.
